cover.title: a front-end engineer
cover.summary:
pationate by build products, user experiences, and collaborate.
Mainly work on React 18, Next.js 14 and Angular 17.

engineer-developer.title: engineer developer
engineer-developer.text:
search, create, develop, conceptualized architecture, documented, make REX, tests.

I work mainly on front-end part, but i make my studies in back-end developpement, and i reponse to some full-stack solutions today.

lead-tech-team.title: lead tech team
lead-tech-team.text:
create membership, united around a goal or work/research together to create common best practices.

It’s also about manage projects, budgets and cross-functional team leadership (dev, design, audience, acquisition, data analyst and engineer, product manager/owner)

ux-conception.title: UX conception
ux-conception.text:
whatever about it is, a new feature or team organization, user experience is everywere.

During my studies, i obtain a degree on design. I cotinue to use this experience to challenge my organization works with my team, and from my research.
